elements.description: Prints all element names, symbols, and atomic weights. To see all information for a specific element use the element (-e) feature.

element.syntax: helper.py element (ELEMENT_NAME or ELEMENT_SYMBOL) || helper.py -e (ELEMENT_NAME or ELEMENT_SYMBOL)
element.description: Prints all information for a specific element

molmass.description: Converts mols to mass and mass to mols. Supports scientific notation.
